Meaghan searched through the darkness the only thing guiding her was her hand following the twisting walls of the cavern. The only noises heard were the reverberating sound of footsteps and the echoing of tiny droplets of water. "When will this maze end?" Meaghan questioned pausing for a moment to take a break. "I could really use some company!" Meaghan yelled and was rewarded with an echo. Meaghan started to run her one hand getting sore from the friction on the wall. She tripped over the smallest of stones and tumbled to a halt in the center of the hall. "Ouch" Meaghan said softly clutching her bleeding leg. Even if there was no light the blood could be felt on the side of her leg. It was a deep gash, about as big as a bullet and a few inches in length. "Natasha.Tanya.Stephanie.Diar.Kyoi.Rue.Adam!" Meaghan yelled helplessly. "Help me.anyone" Meaghan sobbed into her leg.

Adam drifted in and out of consciousness. His eye's completely blurry of his surroundings. When his eyes focused he wished they hadn't. The sun had temporary blinded him "shit" Adam whispered running his hands over his eyes. When Adam regained his sight he took a look around. "This can't get any worse" Adam held his hand to his head. He was sure not to let the other move. Adam was located on the edge of a plank of wood attached to the thinnest of poles too many feet to count in the air. Adam took a quick glance over the edge and pulled back quickly holding in his lunch. "How the hell do I get out of this one, jump to my death?" Adam asked himself sarcastically. Adam crossed his hands over his chest and quickly put them back on the edge of the wood. "Oh god" Adam whispered. The plank began to rotate slowly but it had started.

"Why do you have Natasha?" Kyoi asked glaring at the wolf. "Why should I tell you? But she will be a tasty treat when you die!" The wolf growled low standing his ground. It would have been a weird sight if anyone would, have been there to witness it. A man with black demon wings floating in mid air with a growling blue wolf opposite him with gigantic claws. "I don't intend to die" Kyoi smirked switching his sword hand to his left. "You're a fool Demon" The wolf raised his head in the air and howled to the now red full moon. "What the hell?"
